reviews.review: нештяк

Un gameplay simple, agressif et efficace.
Des graphismes passablement élégants mais pas trop surchargés.
Des cartes sobres où on peut guère se dissimuler dans le décor.
Une communauté assez bonne dans l'ensemble.
Un jeu qui reste égal à lui-même dans le temps, sans être abâtardi pas de fréquentes MàJ inutiles voire cancérigènes.

Sur CS:S vous êtes à l'abri de toute la masse de conneries faite sur CS:GO.
Хорошая игра!!!
better then go and 1.6 imo
起源是一款好游戏，在GO没出来前还有很多人玩。可出了以后老玩家就几乎全跑到GO去了，每天只有几千人在玩，国内服务器也只有僵尸乐园等苦苦撑着，希望能流入新鲜血液，让起源重现生机！

Gameplay is Repetitive, Deaths are always Cheap and Enraging, The Guns are Horrific and how they work makes no sense, Hit Detection's a joke and all the official Maps are mostly Flat, boring choke point spam-fests.      FIRE IN THE HOLE Simulator 2004

Custom servers aren't any better either - The players who pay to win or 'Donate' to the server's moderators, will basically gain access to unfair advantages; such as more health/armor and weapon damage; So God power to you if you're willing to play against the degenerates who will snipe you in spawn with the AWP every two seconds. All of the custom gamemodes are total garbage.

Worst of all is the attitude of most players - You're in some french/mexican/russian server and then you get booted for just having a different nationality. The langauge 'English' does not exist in this Game; But if you do find someone who does speak English, which would be Rarer than finding a factory new knife in CS:GO - Chances are is that he'll probably be as obnoxious as the other players. 

This Game is basically some International Basement for people who are third-world party baboons that are from the Armpit of the world. I just cannot get my head around of why this Game costs $10 more than CSGO, because Valve wanted to take advantage of Garry's Mod? That is just low. 

EDIT - CS:GO is now for free but Source isn't, what's the point, why does this game even exist?

по сравнению с сыном CS:GO CS:S позволяет качать на себя моды не возникая что это лишнее и ей это не надо сервера с классными режимами всегда забиты забавными людьми Гейб сделал ошибку с CS:GO но не прогадал с CS:S надеюсь ты это поймешь и исправишся в следующей игре а пока это ещё одна из игр в которые я играю по сей день!

ium proud

Para mi el mejor de todos los Counter. El CSGO está bien, pero es que este es insuperable, yo soy de clásicos por decirlo de alguna manera y este fue mi primer shooter junto al MW2, los mapas de surf son los mejores y te lo pasas genial si tienes alguien con quien jugarlos. Recomendadísimo.
Old But Gold..

Моя сама любимая часть из CS . Я графодрочер, поэтому играть в 1,6 вообще не могу. Как и в более ранние версии CS GO тоже ничего, но особых плюсов перед CS Source я не вижу. Да, бывает сервера с большим количеством школьников и прочих неадекватов, но в целом, CS ещё жива и можно найти сервис по-нраву.

Counter Strike мне нравится даже больше чем Батла. Ибо в последней просто неимоверные задроты, никаких градации на pro и noob сервера фактически нет:  ты заходишь после работы, думаешь сыграть, а тебя сразу же убивают. Респаунт, бежишь  сразу же убивают. Чёртовы задроты. К счастью в CS всё проще и там я даже лидирую. Вполне можно расслабиться, не будучи про-задротом. Рекомендую.

To be honest, I just bought this game with Garrys Mod so that I didn't have as many missing textures. At the time I didn't relize that I could get all the textures free. But after actually playing this, it is a lot of fun and I can recommend this with outstanding possitivity.

ALL ROADS LEAD TO CSS

This game is all-time steam classic.
It's one of the few games that made steam what it is today. 
Game is gold.

You will get very good FramesPerSecond and movement is
much more natural and responsive, unlike CSGO. Rounds are
fast and there is no pressure of rank and achievements, it is
played for pure fun. Thats why it is priced $20 lol compared to
other Valve games that are less, it is actually fair price :D
compared to what it gives. Fun communities, respectful
(majority) player base and great enjoyable mods like DM,
Gungame, surf, bhop, zombie, scoutzknivez, rpg, rotation
pubs, snipers and many more. In this game you dont wait for 
hours to kill an enemy like in PUBG and you dont get attacked 
by 10 year old kid like in CSGO calling you niqqer or whatnot....

I am admin on AWPclan.com, this has been my go to place,
for years! (only 15 000h in CSS! :)) We run some top notch
css servers..... 8 servers with different mods. Servers
are equipped with 3 anti-cheats and anti-scripter module
for hack free enviroment also powered by oldschool,
respectful and honorable admins with thousands 
of hours in css only.

If you wanna check out our fun dm:
connect 192.223.31.71:27015 (in console)
░▓█► The Best CRACKHOUSE [DM] :: ÀωÞclan.com (14/32)


So,
Still CSS > CSGO if you ask me.

Once you go AWP you never go back.
http://www.awpclan.com

Have fun and happy holidayz!

Un classico, il miglior counter strike a parer mio.

Since I was a 1.6 baby I naturally moved over to source with many others. Spent more time playing CS than any other game and probably had the most fun in custom maps than I did in many other games. Really a great game for its time. If you were burnt out on competitive pubs, Surf maps and custom maps by the Nipper Regs and KZ climbing servers were fun also. Played some CAL also and wouldn't trade the experience. Some of this transferred over to source some was lost and I think that was the tough part. Losing good custom maps from 1.6 and partitioning the playerbase wasn't fun but there was plenty of activity when the game was new.

С чего и как написать обзор, не имею понятия.
Начинал играть в эту игрушку с самого открытия. В то время, я был против того, чтобы скачивать ее со стима. Если зашел разговор об этом...
Когда я учился в школе, мне друг дал диск, в котром была сама эта игрушка. Естественно пиратка, версия 34. Играл с другом по фану, шло время и начинал понимать, а если играть на полную катушку и понять всю систему. Динамику ходьбы и т.п. Шло время, и скилл вырос. На данный момент, играю в нее по 5-30 минут. Ну так, новая версия CS:GO.

Всем советую, сыграть в нее и раздавать пару голов за 5 секунд. После всего этого, можно со смелой душой сесть и вспомнить все, что было и что стало с кс. Решайте сами... но эту CS:S v34 никогда не забуду!!

This game is as good as it used to be. It's maybe not as competetive as Csgo. But css has something in it that made me pretty much rebuy it on my new account. On my old accout I got 800+hrs on the game and still love it to this day. There is just something that makes me always want to go back to this game and play it at least a hr or two a week :)
I am writing this review in 2016, just FYI. This game is very good, despite being almost a decade old. Highly addictive MMO FPS with great graphics. Really a staple for any FPS player :)

This game is amazing..

After wanting this game for a while now, I am definitely not dissapointed.
I love the feel of this game and its easy strafe + bhop.
This game doesn't have some of the nerfs that CS:GO has, 
So the awp mobility speed is greatly increased making it way more easy to use.
The feel and simple to use weapons makes it fun to jump around and just try to get some quick kills.

Even though this is a great game..
Some weapons are still pretty broken,
With deagle having almost precise accuracy so it can be spammed to kill someone very quick.
